about.title: About Me
about.about-p: I had my first working experiences in logistics and retail, until i moved to London in 2015 and I started working in the hospitality industry. I spent nearly ten years in the UK, growing both professionaly and personally while working in high-end restaurants and private member clubs.
about.about-p2:
Over the time though i felt the need for a change, something that would allow me to create, learn continuously, and work remotely.
That's when I decided to reinvent myself and to start my journey into tech. In 2024, I enrolled for the Code Institute's Full Stack Developer Course, and started studying web development, gradually transitioning into a more creative and fulfilling career path, eventually leaving my job in hospitality, and achieved my diploma.
about.about-p3: This journey taught me resilience, discipline, and the importance of building things and pursue goals that are both functional and meaningful.
about.timeline-p1: Enrolled for the Code Institute Full stack Developer Course
about.timeline-p2: Started learning HTML and CSS and built my first project.
about.timeline-p3: Started learning and working with JavaScript and Python, also building Pictures and Places as my second portfolio project.
about.timeline-p4: Started working with Django and PostgreSQL databases and built Sapore Di Mare, my first full stack project.
about.timeline-p5: First started working with React and built Vibook, my last project to complete the course.
about.timeline-p6: Completed the Code Institute Full Stack developer course.
about.timeline-p7: Keeping on building and improving my portfolio, and in the meantime I'm strengthening my knowledge of programming languages and frameworks, while developing for small businesses and professionals, always available for new collaborations and work opportunities.
about.collab2: Feel free to get in touch here or on Linkedin. You can also check out more of my work on GitHub.

seo.title: Selected Work — Portfolio

hero.title: Selected Work
hero.lead: A collection of projects that blend functionality, design, and storytelling. Each one represents a different challenge — from full-stack applications to creative, experience-driven websites.

sv.tagline: Full-stack e-commerce with secure payments and multilingual UX
sv.desc: A modern, fully responsive e-commerce built with React (Vite) and a lightweight Node/Express backend. It ships advanced product filters, wishlist, search, and a complete Stripe Checkout flow. Internationalization with react-i18next. Deployed on Vercel (frontend) and Railway (backend).
sv.img1Alt: Sneakers Vault — product grid and filters
sv.img3Alt: Sneakers Vault — wishlist and multilingual UI

sdm.tagline: Restaurant booking with real-time table availability
sdm.desc: Django-based booking platform with overlap prevention and a custom admin table map with color indicators for availability. Staff can edit table capacity. Automated tests validate booking creation and core availability logic.
sdm.img1Alt: Sapore di Mare — admin table map with status colors
sdm.img2Alt: Sapore di Mare — booking form and availability

ff.desc: Showcase site for a videomaking studio: futuristic UI, hero video, animated sections, responsive image grids and an EmailJS contact flow (in progress).

seo.title: Services — Web Experiences that Work

hero.title: Web experiences that work.
hero.lead: I craft modern, responsive and high-performance websites designed to elevate your brand and strengthen your online presence. Each project is carefully built with design, speed and basic SEO in mind.

overview.title: How I can help
overview.lead: Tailored solutions for local businesses, freelancers and small brands: professional, easy-to-manage sites with optional extras like bookings, contact forms or secure payments.

common.timeline: Typical timeline: 1–2 weeks, depending on content.

landing.title: Landing Page
landing.desc: Single-page site with essential sections (hero, services, contact and form). Thoughtful design, light animations and focused calls-to-action.

dynamic.title: Dynamic Site
dynamic.desc: A site where you can manage content autonomously (images and text). Includes a simple admin and basic content management features.
dynamic.note_external: For specific features (management systems, bookings, payments) I integrate third-party services. Choices and costs are agreed during the planning phase.

custom.title: Custom Solutions
custom.desc: When you need something unique: web apps, micro-SaaS, gated areas or interactive experiences.
custom.item3: Deployment and handoff with usage guide

extras.title: Integrations & extras (optional)
extras.lead: You can add them anytime, even after launch:
extras.booking: External booking systems (Trafft, Setmore, Calendly) — widget integration for classes, appointments or services
extras.payments: Online payments (Stripe Payment Links) — “Pay now” buttons with secure Stripe-hosted pages
extras.forms: Advanced contact form — automatic email delivery via external service (Formspree / Netlify Forms)
extras.seo_analytics: Advanced SEO and Google Analytics — search optimization and traffic tracking
extras.note_costs: Any third-party fees are paid by the client and will be discussed before integration.

delivery.title: Delivery & support
delivery.item1: Optimized for desktop, tablet and mobile
delivery.item2: 1 month of support included for fixes or small changes

terms.title: Payment terms
